TopicTitle: How long does your game take to load?

Articles.Content: Just a general curiosity thread...mine takes 45 minutes. I have ALOT of addons and mods.

not this again... currently ~30 sec. I have like 10 mods

Edited June 8, 2013 by leax256
I have a ton of mods and such, so it's usually around 1-3 minutes. Maybe more.
30 seconds, I have two mods.
Around 1 minute to 2, maybe even less.
3 minutes, stock. but prior to launching i use half of my ram already and i have around 80% of my 6TB filled

about 2-3 mins.

I have several mods, including KW rocketry, B9 aerospace, bits (that work) of NovaPunch, KAS, Kethane, some Bobcat, DSM, Kosmos, DamnedRobotics (temp fix), and several other smaller mods.

OP how often does your game crash with an out of memory exception? I found too many mods results in more frequent crashes, and if ur taking 45 min to load crashes must make you curse!
Around 20 seconds, I have a few mods.
Several minutes with or without mods. not a new system, or an expensive one. :\
15-20 seconds. i5 2500k @ 3.3 GHz. Crucial C300 SSD. Two mods (KER and nyrath's Orion)

Depends on the universe I am loading, but my minimal-mod "reality" universe takes about 15 seconds. I only use Crew Manifest, Engineering Redux and Sub-Assembly Loader there. I have a great rig though, with a solid state drive.
25 seconds stock. i5 3570k @ 4.2Ghz. 7200 RPM harddrive.
No mods, bad graphics card that can't handle the shaders in KSP, about a good 5 - 10 minutes
15 seconds or less without mods installed
45 sec. no mods

These extreme loading times appear to be caused by a new unity bug (introduced on the latest version and exposed by a tweak on 20.2). There is a known workaround, which is to disable any unconnected network adapters you may have.

I can't guarantee it'll work for everyone, but it appears to have been effective for many.

Cheers
20 seconds to about a minute depending on what else I might be running at the time. I multitask a lot since I got my second monitor.

Is this from using UnityEngine.WWW for loading files?

It seems to me, naively, like a really, REALLY bad idea to load files through this mechanism and file:// URLs... considering that threading is somewhat alien in the world of Unity, the fact that it kicks off an asynchronous process also seems rude.
2-3 minutes but I mod very heavily.
3 minutes no mods or additions.
17 Seconds +/- 1 second (Each loading was 16-18), 7 Mods installed, Graphics set to max.
3-5 minutes. I usually double click the icon and then go make a sandwich.
Just tested it - Ive got an inexpensive, 'common' 7k Rpm hard drive and it takes 1 minute to load with several mods.. I really cant imagine it taking 45 MINUTES!

My load time is around 15-20 mins. Even tho i dont use many mods and are all up-to-date. (Yes, the loading is very, very annoying. Else i freaking love the game enough to just not care too much about it)

Takes about 3-4 minutes here with around 20 mods including B9 Aero and that AILS or whatever the new one was named. I found installing Ferram really degraded my load time and ingame performance so I run with stock aero which bothers me not at all. Open KSP, go get a drink, come back, read an article on slashdot or something and bam ksp ready.
